title: Consultation
description: We start with a discussion to understand the client’s vision, style, and space requirements, laying the foundation for the project.

title: Site Visit & Vastu Review
description: We assess the site’s layout, considering vastu principles for harmony if requested, ensuring design aligns with natural orientation.

title: Design Concepts
description: We develop three tailored design options based on client preferences, offering distinct layouts for the client’s selection.

title: Budget Estimate
description: A detailed, transparent budget is provided, outlining costs for materials and finishes, aiding in informed decision-making.

title: Construction Planning
description: Approved designs move to the construction phase, supported by precise working drawings for all technical details.

title: Quality Checks
description: Regular quality assessments are conducted during construction to maintain standards, with updates provided to the client.

title: Final Handover
description: After a thorough walkthrough, we ensure the project meets client expectations before officially handing over the completed property.
